Dataframe Frequencies

Source: R/frequencies.R
frequencies.Rd

Calculates frequencies of every Column in a dataframe

Usage

frequencies(df, perc = FALSE)

Arguments

df

Dataframe with data

perc

Logical indicating whether or not to calculate percentages and valid percentages for each value by variable

Value

Dataframe of frequencies for each variable and value

Examples

frequencies(mtcars)
#>      var value  n
#> 1    mpg  10.4  2
#> 2    mpg  13.3  1
#> 3    mpg  14.3  1
#> 4    mpg  14.7  1
